scripts.aisc: npm run aisc-sync-blog && npm run sync-data && npm run aisc-serve
scripts.a-i: npm run aisc-sync-blog && npm run sync-data && next a-i -p 3100
scripts.dev-watch-blog: cd aisc && processmd content/**/*.md --highlight-code=0 --outputDir content --preview 110 --summaryOutput content/summary.json --watch
scripts.aisc-sync-blog: cd aisc && processmd content/**/*.md --highlight-code=0 --outputDir content --preview 110 --summaryOutput content/summary.json
scripts.member-fb-serve: npm run member-fb-set-env && cross-env GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=`pwd`/keys/fb-service.json firebase serve --only functions --port=3600
scripts.member-fb: npm run member-fb-build && concurrently "npm run member-fb-watch" "npm run member-fb-serve"
scripts.sync-data: npm run sync-contentful & npm run sync-schedule
scripts.aisc-build: npm run aisc-sync-blog && npm run sync-data && next build aisc && npm run aisc-build-sitemap
scripts.a-i-build: npm run aisc-sync-blog && next build a-i && npm run a-i-build-sitemap
scripts.aisc-export: npm run aisc-build && next export aisc && cp aisc/root-static/* aisc/out/
scripts.member-fb-deploy: npm run member-fb-build && cp member/functions/package.json member/functions-dist && cross-env GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=`pwd`/keys/fb-service.json firebase deploy
scripts.member-export: npm run member-build && next export member
scripts.a-i-export: npm run a-i-build && next export a-i && cp a-i/root-static/* a-i/out/
